Text: Dude any chance of the original Starship Troopers getting done, nobody has a proper 720P version. And you would be the 1st to do it. Awesome effort btw.
Yeah I got a good copy of that one........If more people request it, I will put it up...Thx for ur feedback

Thanks for the up :-)

I use a Dvico 6600 media player, 55" LED Samsung TV and Onkyo receiver (HD audio)
One thing I'd like to see less of is AAC audio and more AC3/DTS
Not many things can output 5.1 in AAC
my self i convert to dvd so any body can injoy thanks for the d/l

@ozsteve

I agree totally....alot of encoders use 6 channel ACC which is not true Dolby Digital 5.1. Its the equivalent of Pro Logic II but its not Dolby Digital. Most receivers can't identify it so it outputs it as a Pro Logic II track with sound going to all 6 channels. U can def tell the difference between 6 channel and DD 5.1......I would like to go with DTS but not enuff Media Players support it.
